title: Zaika Kitchen warm culinary UI theme + typography + layout polish (visual-only)

requirements.summary: Establish a cohesive warm, modern culinary visual theme across the app (palette, typography hierarchy, spacing, elevation) without changing functionality.
acceptanceCriteria: A single coherent visual style is apparent across all pages (Header/Footer + main pages) with consistent color usage, typography, spacing, and radius/shadow treatment.
Theme avoids a generic default look by using a distinct warm, food-inspired palette (not blue/purple-dominant unless already present) and consistent typographic hierarchy (H1/H2/body/captions).
No user-facing text is changed away from English.

file_operations.description: Refine global base styling for a warm culinary look (e.g., background treatment, default text rendering, consistent spacing rhythm helpers via utility classes in @layer base/components). Keep all changes token-driven via CSS variables and Tailwind utilities (no page-specific hardcoding-only).

Extend Tailwind theme to support the new warm culinary design language: update container defaults if needed, add font families, and add any small reusable shadow/radius/elevation presets to standardize the look across pages.
Polish global layout composition (main area padding, consistent vertical spacing between header/page/footer) while preserving existing routing and Outlet behavior.
Apply the cohesive theme to the Home hero/feature/CTA sections using consistent spacing, gradients, and card/button styling, while keeping the existing content and actions intact.
Apply the cohesive theme to Menu tabs and item cards (elevation, borders, image treatment, price emphasis) without changing filtering/sorting/add-to-cart behavior.
Apply the cohesive theme to Checkout grouping and emphasis (cart list rows, summary card, totals hierarchy) without altering Stripe/WhatsApp logic.
Apply the cohesive theme to Contact cards and map container styling (consistent card padding, icon styling, subtle elevation) without changing data fetching or links.
Align Notifications page styling to the cohesive theme (list row spacing, hover states, badges) without changing read/unread or navigation behavior.
Align Orders table/card styling to the cohesive theme (header hierarchy, table density, badges/buttons) without changing sorting or navigation behavior.
Align Order tracking status timeline and totals section to the cohesive theme (consistent colors, spacing, and emphasis) without changing status logic.

requirements.summary: Update Tailwind/Shadcn global theme tokens and base styles for premium, consistent light + dark mode contrast using the existing CSS-variable approach.
acceptanceCriteria: Light mode and dark mode both have readable contrast for background/foreground, muted text, borders, and primary/accent colors (no washed-out text on cards or gradients).
Global background, card, and border styling feels consistent across pages (e.g., subtle elevation/shadows and balanced border opacity).
Changes are implemented via the existing CSS variable theme approach (e.g., the variables in frontend/src/index.css) rather than page-by-page hardcoding only.

file_operations.description: Rework the existing light/dark CSS variable tokens (background/foreground/card/popover/muted/border/input/ring/primary/secondary/accent/destructive) to a warm food-inspired palette with strong contrast. Ensure border opacity and surfaces look premium and consistent across the app.

Ensure Tailwind color mappings (oklch(var(--...))) correctly support the updated tokens (including ring alpha usage). Add/adjust shared shadow presets for consistent card elevation across light/dark mode.
Update PWA theme-related colors (e.g., theme_color/background_color if present) to match the updated warm palette for a consistent branded feel in the browser/app shell.

requirements.summary: Improve site-wide typography (font choices, scale, line-height, tracking) and ensure consistent heading/body sizing across key pages.
acceptanceCriteria: Headings and body text have a clear hierarchy: page titles are visually dominant, section headings are consistent, and muted/supporting text is legible.
Buttons, tabs, badges, and navigation text sizes feel balanced and consistent between mobile and desktop breakpoints.
No layout regressions: text does not overflow or truncate unexpectedly in header nav, cards, tabs, or checkout summary at common screen sizes.

file_operations.description: Add/update the app font loading (e.g., a warm, modern pairing such as a refined sans for UI + optional display face for headings) using standard web font loading in the HTML head. Keep this change purely presentational.
Define Tailwind font families and (if needed) extend fontSize/lineHeight/letterSpacing defaults to establish a consistent typographic scale for headings, body, captions, and UI labels.
Set global typography defaults (font-smoothing, base line-height, consistent heading defaults using @layer base) so page titles/section titles/body text are consistent without per-page overrides.
Adjust navigation typography and spacing (logo wordmark sizing, link sizing, active/hover clarity) to match the new typographic hierarchy without changing navigation behavior.
Align Home typography to the new scale (hero H1, section H2, supporting copy) ensuring responsive sizing and no overflow on common breakpoints.
Align Menu page title, tab trigger sizing, card title/description, and price emphasis to the new typographic scale without impacting layout stability.
Improve Checkout typographic hierarchy (Order Items vs Summary vs Total) and ensure buttons and helper text remain readable and consistent on mobile/desktop.
Improve Contact page title/description and card headings/body text for consistent hierarchy and legibility.
Improve Orders page header typography and table text density for readability without truncation or overflow.
Improve Notifications page header typography and list-row text sizing/line-height for readability and consistent hierarchy.

requirements.summary: Refine shared layout areas (Header/Footer/container spacing) and key page sections (Home, Menu, Checkout, Contact) for a more modern, designed feel while preserving behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: Header looks intentionally designed (balanced spacing, improved hover/active states, better alignment of logo/nav/actions) while preserving existing behavior (cart, notifications, admin link, mobile sheet).
Home page hero/sections look more premium via improved spacing, gradient usage, card styling, and button variants, while keeping the existing content and actions intact.
Menu page cards and tabs feel consistent and visually refined (card elevation/borders, image treatment, price emphasis, button styling) without changing menu filtering/add-to-cart behavior.
Checkout page readability is improved (clear grouping, spacing, and emphasis for totals) without changing the Stripe/WhatsApp flows.

file_operations.description: Polish header layout and interactions: container alignment, nav link hover/active styling, icon button states, and sticky/blur surface treatment while preserving all existing actions (cart, notifications, admin link, mobile sheet, logout).
Refine footer spacing, section separation, and muted surface styling for a more premium, consistent look across light/dark mode without changing content or links.
Add consistent page-level padding/vertical rhythm so each page feels designed and consistent, without changing route structure or behavior.
Refine Home hero (background gradient, spacing, CTA grouping) and feature cards (elevation, border, hover) to look more modern while keeping current components and actions.
Refine TabsList layout (wrap/scroll behavior as needed for smaller screens), tab trigger styling, and menu item card composition (image container, card padding, CTA alignment) without changing logic.
Improve checkout visual grouping: item row dividers, quantity controls spacing, summary emphasis (Total row), and button prominence while keeping all payment/WhatsApp flows unchanged.
Refine Contact cards and map iframe container (radius, border, surface elevation) for a modern designed look without changing fetched data or behaviors.
